title: Is QSS the only option for AP people against malzahar?
body: Is QSS the only option for AP people against malzahar because if you don't build it he can just oneshot you with his combo.

replies.body:
mercs, banshees, qss.
also git gud.

Banshee's, although he can pop that with his E, but would reduce the combo.
If it's a ranked, you can take cleanse.

Ah forgot about that.
I never understood why the cleanse applications weren't as comprehensive as QSS.

2 posts im not sure if trolling...

i chose to reply to this one even tho it is older...

cleanse? are you %%%%ing %%%%%%ed? or on drugs?

LOL more complaints about malz OP, there are 30 odd champs that are worst than malz he is immobile, easy way to counter malz is to use veig or play a tank, as a regular malz player i know how strong he can be but its all down to the player if the player is good malz is OP if the player is bad malz is useless and feeds hard
Complaining about Malzahar, how bad did you just get rekt by one? All i'm hearing is PJSalt.

many mid laners can "one shot" with a combo (technically a combo is more than one shot but I get the jist).

I'd say think of an appropriate match up first and then build 2nd.
Get Merc. treads, roam, laneswap with a tank. You can't play conventionally vs Malzahar because his kit is designed to horribly murder midlaners that try.
